name: astar-ts
description: Generic synchronous A* search algorithm in TypeScript.  Descends from andrewrk/node-astar

scripts.clean: rimraf -f build && rimraf -f docs && rimraf -f dist && mkdir build && mkdir docs && mkdir dist && cd build && mkdir ts && mkdir rollup && mkdir terser && cd ../src/ts && rimraf -f generated_code && mkdir generated_code && cd ../..
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run version && npm run typescript && npm run test && npm run dist
scripts.dist: cp build/ts/index.js dist/ && cp build/ts/*.d.ts dist/
